channel.title: How do i change from spawning 0000 to 00000
channel.description: subject says it.. im using project czar (silabs) but will only let u spawn up to 9999

item.title: How do i change from spawning 0000 to 00000
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

No he wants to make it so he can pick up the new Runescape items.
As the new Runescape items that silab added are 00000 she needs to be able for it to do that rarther then 0000.

item.source: How do i change from spawning 0000 to 00000

item.title: How do i change from spawning 0000 to 00000
item.dc:creator: @For For ( ; ; )
item.description:
@For wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:2, topic:167421”]use dodian’s pickup command

		if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 1)) {
			String[] args = command.split(" ");
			if (args.length == 3) {
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
				if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			} else {
				sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100");
			}
		}

you don’t have to use zero’s in this one if you want to spawn gold you use

::pickup 995 9999
not
::pickup 0995 9999

much eaiser?[/quote]

Yay someone read my string splitting tutorial hopes

Why not …

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = 1; try { newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); } catch (Exception e) { newItemAmount = 1; } if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } }

That way you don’t have to type an amount if you only want 1 item.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change from spawning 0000 to 00000
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

use dodian’s pickup command

		if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 1)) {
			String[] args = command.split(" ");
			if (args.length == 3) {
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
				if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			} else {
				sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 800 100");
			}
		}

you don’t have to use zero’s in this one if you want to spawn gold you use

::pickup 995 9999
not
::pickup 0995 9999

much eaiser?

Read full topic
